fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Leech from a player at night. Players you leech from will be drained of one attribute, which will be added to you. Their Defense is set to Vulnerable for one night after being leeched. If your target does not have any attributes, you will fail and they will not be notified of your visit.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game. You must have more attributes than any other living player.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
You were drained by the Parasite! You have been stripped of your \_\_\_\_\_\_ attribute and your Defense has been set to Vulnerable.
Your defense has been reset. (End of next night)
Your target had no attributes.
You stripped your target of their \_\_\_\_\_\_ attribute!
